title: De Havilland Canada - Wikipedia
snippet: The new facility is intended to merge its two manufacturing facilities and produce the Twin Otter and Dash 8 planes, as well as the new DHC-515 firefighting aircraft. First production at the new site is planned to begin in 2025. The company also owns the type certificates for aircraft produced ...

title: De Havilland Aircraft of Canada Acquires Fleet Canada Inc.
snippet: CALGARY, Alberta, April 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, De Havilland Aircraft of Canada (DHC) announced that it has acquired all of the shares of Fleet Canada Inc.

title: De Havilland Canada acquires Fleet Canada to expand manufacturing capabilities
snippet: April 2, 2025 · 9:28 am · Financial · De Havilland Canada, Fleet Canada · © Fleet Canada · De Havilland Aircraft of Canada (DHC) has acquired all shares of Fleet Canada Inc.
